Class AutoCompleter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.web.autocompletion.AutoCompleter

  • public class AutoCompleter
extends java.lang.Object
    Autocompleter class for initializing and using the autocompletion

        public java.lang.String[] getList(java.lang.String query,
                         java.lang.String field)
        returns a string array with the search results of the query in the field
        Parameters:
        query - is the string used for search
        field - is the field in which you like to search (e.g. name)
        Returns:
        stringList string array with the whole search results including an error flag at position 0

        Returns n search results
        Parameters:
        query - is the string used for search
        field - is the field in which you like to search (e.g. name)
        n - number of the first n search results
        Returns:
        string array with search results and an error flag at position 0
